sentences.sContent: “For example, if you look at a northern community, they might have a substantial amount of caribou in their diet and they might dry the meat in the home, ” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “For example, if you look at a northern community, they might have a substantial amount of caribou in their diet and they might dry the meat in the home, ” he said.
sentences.sCn: 他还说：“例如，如果你观察一下北方社区，居民们的饮食中或许有相当多的驯鹿肉，而他们可能在室内把肉晾干。
